titleInfo.title: Joachim Ambert to Auguste Doussan, 1849 July 13

mods.abstract: Joachim Ambert, Chartres, to Auguste Doussan. General Baron Joachim Ambert was a French military officer and nobleman with whom Antoine and Auguste Doussan had dealings. Auguste Doussan was the younger brother of Antoine Doussan. He practiced medicine in Grasse, France, and married Louise Perrin, who was a relative of the Allain family of Louisiana.The letter concerns a copy of a marriage contract.
mods.note: Chartres, France, July 13, 1849, Joachim Ambert to Auguste Doussan. The letter concerns a copy of a marriage contract.
mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.

Physical rights are retained by the LSU Libraries. Copyright has expired and the item is therefore in the public domain. Permission to reproduce this image must be requested through the Special Collections Division, Louisiana State University Libraries.
mods.note: Doussan Family Papers, Mss. 4800, Louisiana and Lower Mississippi Valley Collections, LSU Libraries, Baton Rouge, Louisiana.
